name: places/ChIJH6wwHFpYwokRd66I4nK6gDA
formattedAddress: 446 W 54th St, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 446 W 54th St, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: I had my windshield replaced a few months ago at this location and the staff was very courteous and fixed timely and issued the recalibration certificate. Subsequently had a small issue with windshield sensor and Safelite was very accommodating and fixed very quickly under warranty. Dealership would have charged me an arm and a leg, especially with a lease.   Staff was super friendly and helpful. Thank you!

originalText.text:
Sabrina & Johnson thank you both!
Professional, polite and extremely friendly and knowledgeable
There is something to be said about good customer service and great work.
So glad I had the chance to have these guys perform the work.
I highly recommend them. They replaced back window. Awesome job

originalText.text: Don’t waste your time. Friendly and helpful staff but safelight defines incompetence. After reading many of these reviews about wrong parts and canceled appointments I decided to do my due diligence. As soon as my appointment was scheduled I called to ensure the correct part was ordered. Then I was called to confirm my appointment. I asked and was assured that they had the correct part. Then, the morning of I was called again, shocker—they had the wrong window. So I was given the option of parking a car with a smashed window in Manhattan for another week until they get the right part. Thanks but no thanks. This is what you get for working with a giant corporation. Called Liberty glass in queens who also work with geico and I’m getting my window fixed today. Thanks for nothing Safelight.

originalText.text: They installed my back passenger window, and now half way close it starts to go slow. They said is the window motor but my cat is a 2022 hyundai. Now I been trying to get them to fix it and they won't answer my phone calls. Plus they said they clean all the broken glass from the edges, but they didn't, I found pieces and had to remove them my self. I took it back today for them to doble check if there was broken glass still inside and they said they would do it, on top of all they started to said it was all in my imagination!! They also said they don't warranty their job cleaning 100%. This is by far the worst!! I will send a complaint to my insurance and their corporate. This is at 446 w 54st.

originalText.text: Slow as all hell. I’ve had my windshield replaced before and it was not as long as 3 hours like they have taken. Customer service is lacking. You can barely get them to speak to you. They’re lucky the insurance company basically forces you to use their services. If you don’t have to use them- DON’T!
